title: Open garage doors anywhere in the world  by exploiting this “smart” device
description: A universal password. Unencrypted user data and commands. What could go wrong?

title: Competence wins over excitement with the 2023 Mercedes-Benz EQE SUV
description: This is Mercedes' fourth new EV, and the one best-designed for American tastes.

title: Can you fool a monkey with a magic trick? Only if it has opposable thumbs
description: Sharing biomechanical ability may be key to anticipating movements of the same limbs in others.

title: New buckling spring keyboards recreate IBM’s iconic Model F for modern computers
description: USB, modern OS support and customization options meet vintage IBM inspiration.

title: Apple joins Amazon, Google, and Microsoft in tech industry layoffs
description: The layoffs are a drop in the bucket compared to cuts at competitors, though.

title: Report: China increasingly uses merger reviews to make demands of US companies
description: China demands for access to products could put US firms in "impossible position."

title: Webb confirms we’re looking at some of the Universe’s earliest galaxies
description: Spectroscopy confirms just how old these distant galaxies are.

title: Microsoft’s new Surface Dock tosses the proprietary port, uses Thunderbolt 4
description: Does this mean the Surface Connect port is going away?

title: Tesla worker who rejected $15M award in racism case has payout cut to $3M
description: One jury awarded Owen Diaz $137 million—new jury says $3.2 million is enough.

title: After disrupting businesses, Google Drive’s secret file cap is dead for now
description: The reaction to Google Drive's secret 5 million file limit makes Google hit "undo."

title: Nintendo promises unlimited repairs for “drifting” Joy-Cons throughout Europe
description: But consumer group says it's just a "short-term fix" for a solvable hardware "bug."

title: Report: Spring COVID booster to be authorized for high-risk people in US
description: The move will put US in line with Canada, the UK, and WHO recommendations.

title: VW and Redwood want to recycle your old laptop and cell phone batteries
description: Volkswagen dealerships will put out collection bins for old consumer batteries.

title: In the war on bacteria, it’s time to call in the phages
description: Regulators have to figure out how to get them on the market.

title: Virgin Orbit formally enters bankruptcy, seeking a buyer
description: Branson further cements his position as a "senior" creditor.
